subject: Testosterone
Steroids
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Drug tests continue to ensnare prominent athletes like Floyd Landis, winner of the Tour de France, and Justin Gatlin, who shares the world record in the 100 meters.
snippet: Drug tests continue to ensnare prominent athletes like Floyd Landis, winner of the Tour de France, and Justin Gatlin, who shares the world record in the 100 meters.
